title: Please Riot, I beg you.
body: Riot, I beg you. Please don't give me Riot Kayle/Kayle. I don't mind the free skin, but I don't want another champion. I have OCD and I like having exactly 60 champions on my account. If you randomly give me Kayle and make my roster 61 champions, I legitimately might quit League of Legends. You don't have to give me anything, I don't want anything. Please just don't give me a champion on this account. Please Riot I beg you.

replies.body: We may be able to help out with this!  After you receive the skin, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look into removing it for you.  Kayle won't take it personally!
